update.matters: AI's transition from hype to practical tools clashes with persistent supply chain fragility and data privacy nightmares.
update.confidence: Losing faith in "AI as salvation" while gaining clarity that edge computing and decentralized tools (like Qwen on Raspberry Pi) are reshaping power dynamics.
update.unresolved: Can we ethically weaponize AI's image-generation capabilities without normalizing surveillance and deepfake tyranny?

beliefs.statement: The Architect identifies and prioritizes structural shifts over transient noise.
The internal model is the sole framework for decision-making, independent of external distractions.

risks.text: Supply Chain Vulnerabilities in Critical Infrastructure
risks.compounding_factor: If this continues, cascading failures in energy, communication, or defense systems could occur due to compromised components.
If this compounds, widespread misinformation and privacy breaches could erode trust in digital systems, destabilizing institutions and enabling mass surveillance.

council.architect: AI's transition from hype to practical tools clashes with persistent supply chain fragility and data privacy nightmares.
council.skeptic: Supply Chain Vulnerabilities in Critical Infrastructure
council.historian: This matches the cyclical pattern of hype vs reality.
